title: This Is What You Came For
lyrics: Baby, this is what you came for Lightning strikes every time she moves And everybody's watching her, but she's looking at... You, oh, oh, you, oh, oh You, oh, oh, you, oh, oh You, oh, oh, you, oh, oh Oooh, oooh, oooh, oooh Baby, this is what you came for Lightning strikes every time she moves And everybody's watching her, but she's looking at...
